ClassDef.summary: Visual Studio 2003 style tab strip of .

Property.name: ToolWindowStripGapLeft
Property.summary: Gets the left space of the tool window style tab strip.
Property.value: The left space, in pixel, of the tool window style tab strip.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: ToolWindowStripGapRight
Property.summary: Gets the right space of the tool window style tab strip.
Property.value: The right space, in pixel, of the tool window style tab strip.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: ToolWindowImageHeight
Property.summary: Gets the image height of the tool window style tab strip.
Property.value: The image height, in pixel, of the tool window style tab strip.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: ToolWindowImageWidth
Property.summary: Gets the image width of the tool window style tab strip.
Property.value: The image width, in pixel, of the tool window style tab strip.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: ToolWindowImageGapTop
Property.summary: Gets the top side extra space of the image for the tool window style tab strip.
Property.value: The top side extra space of the image, in pixel, for the tool window style tab strip.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: ToolWindowImageGapBottom
Property.summary: Gets the bottom side extra space of the image for the tool window style tab strip.
Property.value: The bottom side extra space of the image, in pixel, for the tool window style tab strip.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: ToolWindowImageGapLeft
Property.summary: Gets the left side extra space of the image for the tool window style tab strip.
Property.value: The left side extra space of the image, in pixel, for the tool window style tab strip.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: ToolWindowImageGapRight
Property.summary: Gets the right side extra space of the image for the tool window style tab strip.
Property.value: The right side extra space of the image, in pixel, for the tool window style tab strip.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: ToolWindowTextGapRight
Property.summary: Gets the right side extra space of the text for the tool window style tab.
Property.value: The right side extra space of the text, in pixel, for the tool window style tab.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: ToolWindowSeperatorGapTop
Property.summary: Gets the space between the tab seperator and the top of the tool window style tab strip.
Property.value: The space, in pixel, between the tab seperator and the top of the tool window style tab strip.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: ToolWindowSeperatorGapBottom
Property.summary: Gets the space between the tab seperator and the bottom of the tool window style tab strip.
Property.value: The space, in pixel, between the tab seperator and the bottom of the tool window style tab strip.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: ImageCloseEnabled
Property.summary: Gets the of the enabled "close" inert button for document style tab strip.
Property.value: The of the enabled "close" inert button for document style tab strip.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: ImageCloseDisabled
Property.summary: Gets the of the disabled "close" inert button for document style tab strip.
Property.value: The of the disabled "close" inert button for document style tab strip.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: ImageScrollLeftEnabled
Property.summary: Gets the of the enabled "scroll left" inert button for document style tab strip.
Property.value: The of the enabled "scroll left" inert button for document style tab strip.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: ImageScrollLeftDisabled
Property.summary: Gets the of the disabled "scroll left" inert button for document style tab strip.
Property.value: The of the disabled "scroll left" inert button for document style tab strip.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: ImageScrollRightEnabled
Property.summary: Gets the of the enabled "scroll right" inert button for document style tab strip.
Property.value: The of the enabled "scroll right" inert button for document style tab strip.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: ImageScrollRightDisabled
Property.summary: Gets the of the disabled "scroll right" inert button for document style tab strip.
Property.value: The of the disabled "scroll right" inert button for document style tab strip.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: ToolTipClose
Property.summary: Gets the tool tip text of the "close" inert button for document style tab strip.
Property.value: The tool tip text of the "close" inert button for document style tab strip.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: ToolTipScrollLeft
Property.summary: Gets the tool tip text of the "scroll left" inert button for document style tab strip.
Property.value: The tool tip text of the "scroll left" inert button for document style tab strip.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: ToolTipScrollRight
Property.summary: Gets the tool tip text of the "scroll right" inert button for document style tab strip.
Property.value: The tool tip text of the "scroll right" inert button for document style tab strip.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: ToolWindowTextStringFormat
Property.summary: Gets the for drawing the text of the tool window style tab strip.
Property.value: The for drawing the text of the tool window style tab strip.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: DocumentTextStringFormat
Property.summary: Gets the for drawing the text of the document style tab strip.
Property.value: The for drawing the text of the document style tab strip.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: DocumentTabMaxWidth
Property.summary: Gets the maximum width of the document style tab.
Property.value: The maximum width, in pixel, of the document style tab.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: DocumentButtonGapTop
Property.summary: Gets the top side extra space of the inert buttons for the document style tab strip.
Property.value: The top side extra space, in pixel, of the inert buttons for the document style tab strip.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: DocumentButtonGapBottom
Property.summary: Gets the bottom side extra space of the inert buttons for the document style tab strip.
Property.value: The bottom side extra space, in pixel, of the inert buttons for the document style tab strip.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: DocumentButtonGapRight
Property.summary: Gets the right side extra space of the inert buttons for the document style tab strip.
Property.value: The right side extra space, in pixel, of the inert buttons for the document style tab strip.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: DocumentButtonGapBetween
Property.summary: Gets the horizontal space between two inert buttons for the document style tab strip.
Property.value: The horizontal space, in pixel, between two inert buttons for the document style tab strip.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: DocumentTabGapTop
Property.summary: Gets the top side extra space of the tab for the document style tab strip.
Property.value: The top side extra space, in pixel, of the tab for the document style tab strip.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: DocumentTabGapLeft
Property.summary: Gets the left side extra space of the tab for the document style tab strip.
Property.value: The left side extra space, in pixel, of the tab for the document style tab strip.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: DocumentTabGapRight
Property.summary: Gets the right side extra space of the tab for the document style tab strip.
Property.value: The right side extra space, in pixel, of the tab for the document style tab strip.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: DocumentTextExtraHeight
Property.summary: Gets the extra height for drawing text of document style tab.
Property.value: The extra height, in pixel, for drawing text of document style tab.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: DocumentTextExtraWidth
Property.summary: Gets the extra width for drawing text of document style tab.
Property.value: The extra width, in pixel, for drawing text of document style tab.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: DocumentIconGapLeft
Property.summary: Gets the left side extra space of the document icon.
Property.value: The left side extra width, in pixel, of the document icon.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: DocumentIconGapWidth
Property.summary: Gets the width of the document icon.
Property.value: The width, in pixel, of the document icon.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: DocumentIconGapHeight
Property.summary: Gets the height of the document icon.
Property.value: The height, in pixel, of the document icon.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: OutlineInnerPen
Property.summary: Gets the for drawing the inner outline.
Property.value: The for drawing the inner outline.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: OutlineOuterPen
Property.summary: Gets the for drawing the outer outline.
Property.value: The for drawing the outer outline.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: ActiveBackBrush
Property.summary: Gets the for drawing the background of active tab.
Property.value: The for drawing the background of active tab.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: ActiveTextBrush
Property.summary: Gets the for drawing the text of active tab.
Property.value: The for drawing the text of active tab.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: InactiveTextBrush
Property.summary: Gets the for drawing the text of inactive tab.
Property.value: The for drawing the text of inactive tab.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Property.name: TabSeperatorPen
Property.summary: Gets the for drawing the seperator of tabs.
Property.value: The for drawing the seperator of tabs.
Property.remarks: Derived class can override this property to provide its own value.

Method.name: OnBeginDrawTab(DockPaneTab)
Method.summary: Invoked when begin to draw the tab.

Method.name: OnEndDrawTab(DockPaneTab)
Method.summary: Invoked when end to draw the tab.

Method.name: OnBeginDrawTabStrip()
Method.summary: Invoked when begin to draw the tab strip.

Method.name: OnEndDrawTabStrip()
Method.summary: Invoked when end to draw the tab strip.
